  • Classes in com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes used by com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.api
    Class
    Description
    MiniGame
    MiniGame class of all minigames
    - Custom minigame frame can be made with extending this class - Message only send to same minigame players
    MiniGame.Exception
    Minigame exceptions

    How to use "CUSTOM"

    Create exception

    Class
    Description
    MiniGame
    MiniGame class of all minigames
    - Custom minigame frame can be made with extending this class - Message only send to same minigame players
    MiniGame.Exception
    Minigame exceptions

    How to use "CUSTOM"

    Create exception
    TeamBattleMiniGame.Team
    Team which used in TeamBattleMiniGame frame
    Manage: teamName, maxMemberCount, members, color
    TeamBattleMiniGame.TeamRegisterMode
    Team register mode
    - Participants divied into teams when game starts with mode
    - If use TeamRegisterMode.NONE, should register players to team with registerPlayersToTeam()

    [Team Register Mode]
    - NONE, FAIR, FILL, FAIR_FILL, RANDOM or can divide overriding "registerPlayersToTeam()"

    - e.g.
  • Classes in com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes used by com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes.games
    Class
    Description
    MiniGame
    MiniGame class of all minigames
    - Custom minigame frame can be made with extending this class - Message only send to same minigame players
    SoloBattleMiniGame
    [Info]
    - Minigame frame several players can battle individually
    - min player count: 2 or more

    [Rule]
    - nothing
    SoloMiniGame
    [Info]
    - Minigame frame only 1 player can play
    - solo play
    - min player count: 1
    - solo util methods

    [Rule]
    - nothing
    TeamBattleMiniGame
    [Info]
    - Minigame frame players battle with each teams
    - min team count: 2 or more
    - all teams have the same score
    - team util class, methods

    [Custom Option]
    - groupChat: If true, send message only to team members (default: true)
    - teamPVP: If true, team members can not attack each other(pvp option have to be set to true), (default: true)

    [Team Register Mode]
    - Participants divied into teams when game starts with mode
    - See TeamBattleMiniGame.TeamRegisterMode

    [Rule]
    - Create Teams with createTeams()
    - When use initGameSetting(), must call super.initGameSetting()
    - If use TeamRegisterMode.NONE, should register players to team with registerPlayersToTeam()
    TeamBattleMiniGame.Team
    Team which used in TeamBattleMiniGame frame
    Manage: teamName, maxMemberCount, members, color
    TeamMiniGame
    [Info]
    - Minigame frame players cooperate with each other
    - min player count: 1 or more
    - all players have the same score
    - team util methods
    [Rule]
    - must use "plusEveryoneScore()" or "minusEveryoneScore()" for team score
  • Classes in com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes used by com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes.helpers
    Class
    Description
    MiniGame
    MiniGame class of all minigames
    - Custom minigame frame can be made with extending this class - Message only send to same minigame players
